title: Relates to the sale of state owned land
summary: Establishes prior to the disposition of land by state agencies and authorities the state land acquisition advisory council shall review such land; establishes if certain criteria is met such land shall be transferred to the department of environmental conservation.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3119

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. LUPARDO, P. RIVERA, CAHILL, JAFFEE -- read once
         and referred to the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation  to  the
         sale of state lands

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The environmental conservation law is amended by  adding  a
    2  new section 49-0217 to read as follows:
    3  S 49-0217. SALE OF STATE-OWNED LAND.
    4    1.  PRIOR TO THE DISPOSITION OF STATE-OWNED LAND BY STATE AGENCIES AND
    5  AUTHORITIES, THE STATE LAND ACQUISITION  ADVISORY  COUNCIL,  ESTABLISHED
    6  PURSUANT  TO SECTION 49-0211 OF THIS TITLE, SHALL REVIEW ANY SUCH STATE-
    7  OWNED LAND TO DETERMINE:
    8    (A) IF IT IS WITHIN A RESOURCE PROTECTION AREA AS  DESIGNATED  BY  THE
    9  STATE LAND ACQUISITION PLAN, PURSUANT TO SECTION 49-0207 OF THIS TITLE;
   10    (B)  IF  IT  MEETS  A  CATEGORY DEFINITION CONTAINED IN THE STATE LAND
   11  ACQUISITION PLAN, PURSUANT TO SECTION 49-0207 OF THIS TITLE; OR
   12    (C) IF IT RECEIVES A MINIMUM SCORE, ABOVE THE CUTOFF, USING THE APPRO-
   13  PRIATE RATING SYSTEM AS DEFINED IN  THE  STATE  LAND  ACQUISITION  PLAN,
   14  PURSUANT TO SECTION 49-0207 OF THIS TITLE.
   15    2. IF ANY OF THE CRITERIA, AS DESCRIBED IN PARAGRAPHS (A), (B) AND (C)
   16  OF  SUBDIVISION  ONE OF THIS SECTION, ARE MET, SUCH LAND SHALL BE TRANS-
   17  FERRED TO THE DEPARTMENT. THE  DEPARTMENT  SHALL  MANAGE  SUCH  LAND  IN
   18  ACCORDANCE  WITH THE RECOMMENDATIONS OF THE STATE LAND ACQUISITION PLAN,
   19  PURSUANT TO SECTION 49-0207 OF THIS TITLE.
   20    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03280-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the sale of state lands
